attributes.action: FOR THE GOVERNMENT TO START DOING NATURAL IMMUNITY TESTING
attributes.additional_details: This type of action from the government is in direct breach of peoples human rights and freedoms and contradicts the human rights act 1998 in health and social care
attributes.background: For the government to stop indirectly forcing people to have covid-19 vacation in employment, in the freedom of life and in areas of enjoyment untill people have been given the opportunity to show their natural immunity.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you are concerned about certain rules relating to vaccination against COVID, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Recognise immune response to Covid-19 in the Covid pass: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600576

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

If you want the Government to do something different to the above you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
